Literature.Title: Structural and biological features of a novel plant defensin from Brugmansia x candida.
Literature.Author: Kaewklom S, Wongchai M, Petvises S, Hanpithakphong W, Aunpad R

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>251.21µM),Escherichia coli O157(MIC=229.09µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>251.21µM),Vibrio cholerae O1 Inaba(MIC=125.61µM),Shigella sonnei ATCC 11060(MIC=125.61µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 13311(MIC=31.4µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=251.21µM),Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=251.21µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>251.21µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>251.21µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=15.7µM)
